ratings.comment: Tilkens is without a doubt the best professor I've ever encountered.  He shames TED talk speakers with his fantastic lectures.  He truly wants his students to succeed, and is ridiculously clear about expectations and gradable material.  He's the professor you will tell your kids about when you're trying to convince them to go to college one day.
Absolutely one of the best classes I've taken. Prof Tilkens is amazing and very engaging.
TAKE THIS CLASS WITH TILKENS AND IT WILL BE THE BEST CLASS OF YOUR LIFE! He seriously was an amazing professor.
One of the best professors I've had. Amazing presentations. I think I ended the semester over 100%.

Best Professor I've ever had. I love this man. He will spend hours with each and every student to make sure they understand the material inside and out. Not to mention his wife makes cookies for review sessions. Take any and ever class he teaches.

Super easy science course full of annoying freshman. No attendance or reading required. Weekly pop quizzes about the lectures the week before; 4 super simple lab assignments. Keeps lectures interesting but he should stop stealing his immature and very un-funny jokes from the internet/ reddit.

Mike is awesome. Funny guy, amazing powerpoints that keep students focused and not bored, and he is incredibly willing to help. No book, no exams, just weekly quizzes that you need to study for a bit. Lab is interesting and fits in with lecture material.
GREAT public speaker, always incorporates humor into lectures. Highly recommend. Just do the readings (very few, very easy, and online!) and study for the short weekly quizzes, and you will do well!

I only took this class for biological science credits. This is the greatest class to take for non-science people. Tilkens makes everything very clear and it is very obvious he cares about his students. No text book or exams, just weekly quizzes and labs are very conducive for learning this type of material. Highly recommend this class with Tilkens.

Professor Tilkens is an amazing professor. His lectures are engaging, helpful, and incredibly well-rehearsed. He includes funny videos or pics that he somehow makes relevant to the lesson. There are no exams and no textbook, but the weekly quizzes keep you on track material-wise and are extremely fair. The labs are also quite helpful. Great class!

Best professor I've ever had. I despise anything science-related and I loved his class. Mike is hilarious, has awesome powerpoints, and uses interesting videos in his lectures. There's no book, exams, or papers--he just gives out a weekly quiz and his quizzes are short and fair. Lab was interesting and helpful as well. I definitely recommend him!

Tilkens is the best professor I've ever had or could ever wish to have. He's really funny, and makes everything interesting. I was literally disappointed one time when class was canceled. He was very accessible and seemed to really care about his students. If you get the chance, take anthro 105 with Tilks - YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!

Tilkens is HILARIOUS. I go to lecture just to see his awesome powerpoints with random youtube links. He makes learning the material really easy and interesting. No textbooks, or exams, a weekly quiz on material makes up most of your grade. AWESOME lecturer and a very interesting evolution based class
